Description.Name: Beam
Description.Details: This MechWarrior came into your care after a successful hostage rescue mission. Having missed the last MedEvac Dropship operated by your then employer, the local Medics signed them over to your care. After a stint in the Argo's medical facilities, they eventually awakened, recalling their name as Carson 'Beam' Lightfoot. Their last recollection was evaccing from their tank following critical damage to the motive system leaving it a sitting duck.
